text: marumaiyai nampatavarkal ataip parri (eppolutu varum, eppolutu varum enru) avacarappatukinranar. Ayinum, evarkal atai nampiyirukkirarkalo avarkal ataip parrip payantu kontiruppatutan, niccayamaka atu (varuvatu) unmaitan enrum tittamaka arivarkal. Evarkal marumaiyaip parric cantekattil irukkirarkalo avarkal niccayamaka veku turamanatoru valikettiltan irukkirarkal enpatai (napiye!) Arintu kolviraka
